query: Can you help construct a travel plan that begins in Philadelphia and includes visits to 3 different cities in Virginia? The trip duration is for 7 days, from March 15th to March 21st, 2022, with a total budget of $1,800.

plan.transportation: Self-driving, from Philadelphia to Richmond, Duration: 4 hours 2 mins, Distance: 407 km, Cost: $20

plan.lunch: The Daily Kitchen & Bar, Richmond, cost: 25
plan.attraction: Virginia Museum of Fine Arts, Richmond

plan.transportation: Self-driving, from Richmond to Norfolk, Duration: 1 hour 34 mins, Distance: 150 km, Cost: $7
plan.lunch: The Boathouse at Rocketts Landing, Richmond, cost: 25
No Frill Bar and Grill, Norfolk, cost: 25

plan.transportation: Self-driving, from Norfolk to Charlottesville, Duration: 2 hours 36 mins, Distance: 263 km, Cost: $13
Self-driving, from Charlottesville to Philadelphia, Duration: 4 hours 24 mins, Distance: 411 km, Cost: $20
plan.breakfast: MarieBette Cafe and Bakery, Charlottesville, cost: 15
